paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: age not specified, sex not specified

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The study sample consisted of all available (n = 712) carriers of the Finnish LQTS founder mutations, including 88 carriers of KCNH2 R176W.

functional_data.summary: The R176W variant is associated with Long QT syndrome.

variants.segregation_data: Segregation with disease in families not specified.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is part of a larger cohort study on LQTS.
key_quotes: The study sample consisted of all available (n = 712) carriers of the Finnish LQTS founder mutations, including 88 carriers of KCNH2 R176W.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 21 D85N heterozygotes, 2 had KCNH2 L552S.

functional_data.summary: The L552S variant is associated with Long QT syndrome.
